data.lyric:
[ti:This Is Me (Alan Walker Relift) (《马戏之王》电影插曲)]
[ar:Keala Settle/The Greatest Showman Ensemble]
[al:This Is Me (Alan Walker Relift)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]This Is Me (Alan Walker Relift) - Keala Settle (基拉·塞特尔)/The Greatest Showman Ensemble
[00:03.47]Lyrics by：Justin Paul/Benj Paskek
[00:06.94]Composed by：Justin Paul/Benj Paskek
[00:10.41]Lettie Lutz：
[00:11.30]I am not a stranger to the dark
[00:15.73]Hide away they say
[00:18.26]'Cause we don't want your broken parts
[00:21.72]I've learned to be ashamed of all my scars
[00:26.89]Run away they say
[00:29.34]No one'll love you as you are
[00:32.47]But I won't let them break me down to dust
[00:35.71]I know that there's a place for us
[00:39.21]For we are glorious
[00:43.03]When the sharpest words wanna cut me down
[00:47.96]I'm gonna send a flood gonna drown them out
[00:52.60]I am brave I am bruised
[00:55.39]I am who I'm meant to be this is me
[00:59.02]Look out 'cause here I come
[01:03.15]And I'm marchin' on to the beat I drum
[01:07.98]I'm not scared to be seen
[01:10.40]I make no apologies this is me
[01:13.72]Both：
[01:13.90]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:16.37]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:18.72]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:21.21]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:23.09]Oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh oh
[01:27.75]This is me
[01:28.45]Lettie Lutz/Ensemble：
[01:28.91]Another round of bullets hits my skin
[01:32.79]Well fire away 'cause today I won't let the shame sink in
[01:38.35]We are bursting through the barricades and
[01:41.38]Reachin' for the sun
[01:43.11]We are warriors
[01:45.16]Yeah that's what we've become
[01:47.30]Yeah that's what we've become
[01:48.87]I won't let them break me down to dust
[01:51.49]I know that there's a place for us
[01:54.86]For we are glorious
[01:58.37]When the sharpest words wanna cut me down
[02:03.13]I'm gonna send a flood gonna drown them out
[02:07.83]I am brave I am bruised
[02:10.32]I am who I'm meant to be this is me
[02:13.92]Look out 'cause here I come
[02:18.21]And I'm marchin' on to the beat I drum
[02:22.76]I'm not scared to be seen
[02:25.35]I make no apologies this is me
[02:28.60]Lettie Lutz/Ensemble：
[02:29.08]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:31.38]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:33.74]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:36.16]Oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:37.84]Oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh oh
[02:42.73]This is me
[02:43.33]Lettie Lutz：
[02:43.63]When the sharpest words wanna cut me down
[02:48.18]I'm gonna send a flood gonna drown them out
[02:52.62]This is brave this is bruised
[02:55.30]This is who I'm meant to be this is me
[02:58.85]Both：
[02:59.04]Look out 'cause here I come
[03:00.85]Look out 'cause here I come
[03:03.23]And I'm marching on to the beat I drum
[03:06.29]Marching on marching marching on
[03:08.47]I'm not scared to be seen
[03:10.27]I make no apologies this is me
[03:13.85]When the sharpest words wanna cut me down
[03:15.94]I'm gonna send a flood to drown them out
[03:19.22]I'm gonna send a flood gonna drown them out
[03:23.56]Oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh oh oh
[03:27.73]This is me
data.trans:
[ti:这就是我的本色 (Alan Walker Relift) (《马戏之王》电影插曲)]
[ar:Keala Settle/The Greatest Showman Ensemble]
[al:这就是我的本色 (Alan Walker Relift)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.47]//
[00:06.94]//
[00:10.41]//
[00:11.30]我对黑暗一点都不陌生
[00:15.73]人们说 藏起来吧
[00:18.26]因为我们不喜欢绝望崩溃的你
[00:21.72]我早已学会以伤疤为耻
[00:26.89]人们说 快逃跑吧
[00:29.34]没人会喜欢你这个样子
[00:32.47]但是我不会让他们把我说的一无是处
[00:35.71]我知道 世上会有我一席之地
[00:39.21]因为我们这么耀眼
[00:43.03]人们用尖酸刻薄的言语伤害我时
[00:47.96]我会用湍急的洪流将他们淹没
[00:52.60]我很棒 我不怕伤害
[00:55.39]我生来就不凡 这就是我的本色
[00:59.02]小心一点 因为我要反击了
[01:03.15]伴着隆隆鼓声 我浩荡前进
[01:07.98]我不怕被人看到
[01:10.40]我不觉得亏欠 这就是我的本色
[01:13.72]//
[01:13.90]//
[01:16.37]//
[01:18.72]//
[01:21.21]//
[01:23.09]//
[01:27.75]这就是我的本色
[01:28.45]//
[01:28.91]又是一轮狂轰乱炸
[01:32.79]尽管放马过来吧 因为我才不会低头认输
[01:38.35]我们冲破重重阻碍
[01:41.38]跃居朝阳之上 我们这么耀眼
[01:43.11]我们是勇士
[01:45.16]这就是我们光明的未来
[01:47.30]这就是我们光明的未来
[01:48.87]绝不会让他们把我说的一无是处
[01:51.49]我知道 世上会有我一席之地
[01:54.86]因为我们这么耀眼
[01:58.37]想打倒我 那可要小心一点
[02:03.13]我会用湍急的洪流将你们淹没
[02:07.83]我很棒 我不怕伤害
[02:10.32]生来就不凡 这就是我的本色
[02:13.92]小心一点 因为我要反击了
[02:18.21]伴着隆隆鼓声 我浩荡前进
[02:22.76]我不怕被人看到
[02:25.35]我不觉得亏欠 这就是我的本色
[02:28.60]//
[02:29.08]//
[02:31.38]//
[02:33.74]//
[02:36.16]//
[02:37.84]//
[02:42.73]这就是我的本色
[02:43.33]//
[02:43.63]人们用尖酸刻薄的言语伤害我时
[02:48.18]我会用湍急的洪流将他们淹没
[02:52.62]我很棒 我不怕伤害
[02:55.30]我生来就不凡 这就是我的本色
[02:58.85]//
[02:59.04]小心一点 因为我要反击了 
[03:00.85]小心哦 我要反击了
[03:03.23]伴着隆隆鼓声 我浩荡前进  
[03:06.29]迎难而上
[03:08.47]我不怕被人看到
[03:10.27]我不觉得亏欠 这就是我的本色
[03:13.85]人们用尖酸刻薄的言语伤害我时
[03:15.94]我会用湍急的洪流将他们淹没
[03:19.22]我会用湍急的洪流将他们淹没
[03:23.56]//
[03:27.73]这就是我的本色
